plot: Nine-year old Eunhee anxiously prepares for her recorder exam as she struggles to find a place within her own family.
title: The Recorder Exam
plot_es: Nine-year old Eunhee anxiously prepares for her recorder exam as she struggles to find a place within her own family.
plot_en: Nine-year old Eunhee anxiously prepares for her recorder exam as she struggles to find a place within her own family.
